articles.author: Jessie Yeung
articles.title: India's endangered tiger population is rebounding in triumph for conservationists - CNN
articles.description: Tigers once roamed across Asia, their numbers as high as 100,000 at the start of the 20th century, before the species plummeted to the brink of extinction.
articles.content:
Tigers once roamed across Asia, their numbers as high as 100,000 at the start of the 20th century, before the species plummeted to the brink of extinction.

articles.title: Tata Power's distribution arm, ADB ink deal for enhancing Delhi's power distribution system - Economic Times
articles.description: Tata Power Delhi Distribution has signed an agreement worth INR150 crore ($18.2m) for funding from the Asian Development Bank (ADB) to support its grid enhancement plan. The funds will be used to install grid infrastructure improvements and a pilot battery en…
